title: "Dragonfly Survey"

## Overview

Targeted dragonfly and damselfly surveys are conducted around the pond areas and water features in the Nature Discovery Garden to monitor Odonata diversity.

## Objectives

- Monitor dragonfly and damselfly species diversity
- Assess pond ecosystem health
- Document breeding activity and larval development
- Track the success of pond habitat creation
